items.sentence: It's been a while since we've had lunch together.
It's been a while since we've done this together.
I wish I'd been able to buy another one of these.
I'm still not convinced you're telling the truth.
Tom wants his kids to become lawyers and doctors.
Did you know I used to teach French in Australia?
Did your whole family come to Australia with you?
I had a nice conversation with Tom the other day.
Your physical body will wear out and die one day.
Tatoeba: Because you can't meet enough frenchies.
I still haven't had the chance to see this movie.
I finally succeeded in convincing Tom to help us.
Whether you like it or not, you'll have to do it.
I was just about to leave when the bomb went off.
I was just about to leave when the bomb exploded.
Tom and Mary travelled together around the world.
Tom will very likely be the first one to go home.

Tom will very likely be late for his appointment.
